snippet: Amnesty International said Thursday that reports of torture and mistreatment by Mexico’s federal police and military forces had tripled from 2008 to 2011.
lead_paragraph: Amnesty International said Thursday that reports of torture and mistreatment by Mexico’s federal police and military forces had tripled from 2008 to 2011.

headline.main: Mexico: Torture Reports Triple, Group Finds

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
